review: its cheap and the quality its great cant complain. i will be buying more of this in the future for other guitars.
works great and to me its cheap. cant see why you would buy a more expensive guitar cable.Highly recomended
im not a profesional player but i like to play once in a while just for fun and this sound great.
Good Quality cable and price. Works as good as those expensive 99 dlls cables.It does not make any noise
this picks are great for hard rock since they are heavey but not that heavy for solos. I play a lot of metallica songs with it an they are great.
